item.title: Content Inventory and Migration Prioritization
item.description: Content Inventory and Migration Prioritization ðŸŸ¢ Active Overview This document provides a complete inventory of all existing documentation to be migrated to the Hugo static site framework, along with a prioritized migration order. This structured approach ensures systematic migration of content while maintaining documentation availability throughout the process. Complete Content Inventory The following tables list all documentation files in the current structure, organized by layer and section. Root Documentation Layer Project Documentation Current Path Hugo Path Status Priority /docs/README.
